articles.title: Trump threatens Russia with 'severe' tariffs, announces Ukraine arms deal
articles.description: In a dramatic U-turn, the US president boosts arms for Ukraine and threatens tariffs on Russia [4].

articles.title: Southend Airport shut and flights cancelled as plane crashes moments after take-off
articles.description: A plane crashed moments after taking off from Southend Airport, causing the airport to shut down and flights to be cancelled [2]. Pilots reportedly waved to children just before the aircraft crashed 'head first into ground' [2, 5].

articles.title: Israel kills dozens as it bombards Gaza, Lebanon and Syria
articles.description: Dozens of people have been killed in bombardments by Israel in Gaza, Lebanon and Syria [4].
